Reviews.Title: “Bridal Tea House in Hung Hom”
Reviews.Author: IrinaPoms
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 2012 found bad reviews read clean beds comfy toilet shower clean staff helpful english location minutes walk hung hom mrt lot restaurants nearby enjoyed stay recommend hotel budget travellers

Reviews.Title: “How do they plan to build such miniature rooms?”

Reviews.Content: dont people stand lie called twin bedsthe called ac effective controlled youno bag okbut cockroach dont offered free

Reviews.Title: “Make sure to book the DELUXE room !”
Reviews.Author: RaniGirl
Reviews.Content: stayed time booked net arrival entered hotel seen life print outs getting told pics deluxe extra night twice size couch etc highly recommend hotel staff pleasant helpful 10 minute walk subway system heaps buses doorstep yourself map
